title: DarkArtist's Muddy Skies Art
content:

----
[[span class="title"]]Forum[[/span]] » [[span class="title"]]General Discussion / Fan Work[[/span]] » [[span class="camo"]][[[muddy-skies|Muddy Skies Art]]][[/span]]


[[div class="parapost"]]

##ffff00|**Banamanam1202**## 2020/11/02 (Fri) 23:14:15 #52335237
------

This is my fanart of [[span class="moderatorPing muddy"]]@kenneth2332[[/span]]'s creepypasta Muddy Skies. 
I'm not quite sure why, but it really stuck with me. 

[[div class="scp-image-block block-right" style="width:95%; margin-top: 1.2em; margin: auto;"]]
[[image muddy-skies.png style="width:100%;" link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/muddy-skies"]]
[[/div]]
~~~~

Just don't look at the sky during a blackout.

[[/div]]
